1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Brad moves in with his best friend and together they both start on the path that will take them all the way through the 1990s. Who will they be on the dawn of Y2K?

2.title: Valentine's Day
2.plot: Kaity sets Brad up on a blind date with one of her friends while Conor tries to pull off the perfect Valentine's day for her.

3.title: Hunting Season
3.plot: Tensions mount as Brad and Conor are having a tough time as roommates. They ease the tension by engaging in a gauntlet of Duck Hunt. Who will emerge victorious?

4.title: April Fool's
4.plot: A prank war breaks out between Brad and Conor. As the pranks get more and more extreme, they realize there might be someone else pulling the strings.

5.title: Nerf War III
5.plot: One of Conor and Brad's most treasured traditions approaches: The Nerf War. Only this year, Brad may not be able to get off from work in order to fight.

6.title: Who Was He?
6.plot: Veronica calls Brad in a panic and he and Conor come to her rescue, and the details revealed causes a rift between Veronica and Brad.

7.title: Late Fees
7.plot: Brad and Conor race against time to make it to the video store before it closes to avoid incurring the dreaded late fee.

8.title: The Cartridge Quest
8.plot: Brad battles a case of writer's block and a stubborn Legend of Zelda cartridge.

9.title: The Drunkest I've Ever Been
9.plot: The gang tells stories of the drunkest they've ever been.

10.title: Cake
10.plot: Conor gets handcuffed to a chair and tells Brad the story of how he got there.

11.title: Riddle Me This
11.plot: Conor sends Kaity on a riddle fueled anniversary scavenger hunt.

12.title: Intervention
12.plot: Brad organizes an intervention for Veronica and helps her get healthy again.

imdb.plot outline: In the year 1990, Brad, a video game/comic book nerd and aspiring filmmaker moves in with his best friend, Conor. Together, they bond over their mutual love of video games, movies and comic book characters and share important events in each other's lives as well as support each other during the tough times. Conor has somehow managed to hook a great girl in Kaity (an aspiring chef) who not only appreciates her boyfriend's nerdy obsession but encourages them. The trio is frequently visited by Brad's "platonic life partner", Veronica. Veronica is a lesbian with no mouth filter and doesn't care who she offends and tells it like it is, which is refreshing to most. The one thing they all agree on is their mutual love for all the things that made the 90s such a decade of nostalgia, and that slacker Jared is super annoying and won't go away.
imdb.title: Rewind & Reset
plot: A group of nerds living in the 1990s struggle with finding their place in the real world while desperately trying to cling to their love of cartridge video games, comic books and movies on video tape.::Tim Biasi
